<title type="sub">Viz. 1 A Good Womans 2 The humble Mans prayer. By R. A. [i.e. Robert Aylett]</title>
<name>Printed by T. M. for Abel Roper [etc.]</name>
<title type="sub">Viz. 1 A Good Womans 2 The humble Mans prayer. By R. A. [i.e. Robert Aylett]</title>

Præceptis ducimur, Exemplis trahimur. Precepts in Gods most holy Law Do us direct; Examples draw. To the Right Honourable, THE Lady ANNE PIERPOINT Elder Daughter To the Lord Marquisse of DORCHESTER. PART. I. The Good Womans Prayer. Refresh me Lord in this Worlds Wildernesse, And with a cloud of witnesses me lead, Ex. 13. 21 Like fiery Pillars light to holynesse: Heb. 12. 1 Be these divine examples that I read; And grant that I may practise them in word and deed. Contents. Wisdome, Repentance, Knowledg, Prophesie, Faith, Love, Attention, Hope, Obedience, Praise, Prayer, Offerings, Hospitality, Labour of Spirit, and Body, Patience, Affection Conjugal, Due Reverence To Rulers, and to Parents, Womanhood, Courage, good life, a seasond speech, Silence, Heavn's blessing, sight of days, both long & good By these Contents the Text is understood. Grant me the gracious Knowledg of the Queen Of 1 Ki. 10. 1 Sheba, that I may employ the same, As was Act. 18. 26 Priscillas on Apollos seen, As 2 Tim. 1. 5 and 3. 15 Eunice, Pro. 31. 1 Bethsheba, Lois, and the Dame S?. John for childrens government 2 John. 4 Elect doth name. The needful Wisdome into me infuse Of 2 Sa. 14. 2 Theco'as woman, Est. 6. 13 Zerech, 1 Sa. 25. 3 Abigael, And hers that made for 2 Sa. 20. 16 Abels town a truce. In part thy Mysteries to me reveal As with Act. 21. 9 four Virgins, 2 Ki. 24. 14 Hulda and Judg. 4. 4 Debora thou didst deal. 2 Sam. 21. 10 Rispa's Repentance do in me beget, Of Mar. 16. 9 Mary Magdalene, and of the Luk. 7. 38 Saint That at the Pharisees house wash't thy feet. Me with the Hope of Jud. 13. 23 Manoahs Wife acquaint, And Ge. 30. 24 Rachel's that in bearing Joseph was not faint. The Faith of Heb. 11. 11 Sarah into me inspire, Heb. 11. 31 Rahab and Exod. 2. 2 et. 6. 20 Jocabed, the Luk. 45 Mother-Maid, Joh. 11. 22 et. 27 Martha's: Mat. 15. 28Hers that did only crums desire, Of Mat. 9. 22 Her that had the bloody issue staid, And Joh. 4. 27 Hers that at the Well for living water praid. Breath into me to true Religion Love, As was in Gen. 31. 19 Rachel, Ruth. 1. 10 and 2. 12 Ruth, and 1 Sa. 4. 21 Phinces Bride; Unto thy Word my due Attention move, As thou didst Ac. 16. 14 Lydia's by the river side, And Luk. 10. 41 Mary's, whose good choice and part was not deny'd. Make me Obey thy will with all submission, Like 1 Ki. 17. 15 Ely's Hostesse, and in me create Ge. 13. 17 Leah's and 1 Sa. 1. 15 Hannah's spirit of Petition; With Ex. 15. 26 Miriam let me thy Praise relate, And Luk. 2. 36 Anna, that liv'd four score yeers without a mate. O grant that I the Church may stand in stead By Jud. 2. 25 Rahab's, Gen. 18. 6 Sarah's Hospitalitie, Or 2 Sa. 17. 19 Hers that ore the Wel ground corn did spread, Or 2 Ki. 4. 10 Hers that lodgd Elisha carefully, Or Ro. 16. 2 Phebe's, Luk. 10. 14 Martha's, Mary's liberalitie. Thy Ex. 35. 25 Tabernacle (Lord) let me adorn With Gifts, as Luke. 8. 3 Susan and great Chusa's Wife, The Mar. 12. 42 Widow, whose two mites thou didst not scorn, And Act. 9. 36 Dorcas that in all good works was rife, And 2 King. 11. 3. She that Joash gave his first seven yeers of life. My spirituall Labors (Lord) grant the successe Of Rom. 16. 7. and 12 Junia, Persis, Triphose, and Triphene, That thy elected Vessels me may blesse; Grant that my bodily dangers may be seen, As Exo. 1. 17 Egypts Midwives, Jud. 4. 21 Jahel great, Est. 4. 16 Ashuerus Queen. Towards my Husband settle thou my Minde, As was Gen. 24. 65. Rebecca's, modest, reverent, Loving as Ge. 31. 16 Rachel, Jos. 15. 18 Achsah, and as kind As 1 Sam. 25. 19. Michal, 1 Kin. 1. 4 Abishag, and Ps. 45. 10 She that went From Pharaohs royal Court, to live in Solomons tent. As Ge. 29. 25 Leah Silent, and as Patient As churlish Nabals understanding 1 Sa. 25. 26 Wise; And as the 2 Ki. 4. 22 Shunamite obedient; Unto my Parents, to appease all strife, Like Jud. 11. 36 Jephta's virgin-Daughter may I yeeld my life. As in Ge. 35. 8 Rebecca's nurse, so in me frame A nurse-like minde towards my children deer, As Exo. 2. 5 Hers that Moses rear'd: Elimelechs Rut. 4. 16 Dame, Discreet as Isaacks Ge. 25. 28 et 24. 19 Wife let me appear, Whose pains with Rut. 2. 16 gleaning Ruth, give me the grace to bear. Indue me with the Courage to maintain My Families right like fair Nu. 28. 4 Zelopiads breed; With Sarah wicked servants to constrain T'amend, or else out of mine Ge. 21. 10 house to weed Profane, proud Hagar, with her scoffing Saracens seed Grant me Luk. 1. 6 Elizabeths unreproved Life, The season'd Speech of 2 Kin. 5. 3 Naamans wife & maid Gen. 3. 10 and 4. 25 Eve's Happinesse; who for lost Abels life Was with the birth of Holy Seth repaid, My dayes like Ge. 23. 1 Sarahs worth the numbring may be said. Apochriphal are the Stories, not the Life Of Valiant Judith and Susanna chast; 2 Mac. 7. 1Mother of martyrs seaven, young Tobi's wife. Two 2 Macca. 6. 10 women with their babes down head-long cast God make me not the least, although of these the last. But since these starrs have had their slower motions Preserve me, from their errours and commotions. Contents. Enticement, Errour, Means unjust, Temptation. Baling, Contempt, Impatience, Worldly Vanitie, Dissention, Envie, Witchcraft, Imprecation, Contention, Gadding, Mocking, Stoutnesse, Cruelty Lying, Idolatry, Lust, from these good Lord deliver me. Keep me that I like Gen. 3. 6 Eve do not entice Nor be entis'd. Me from her Cor. 11. 3 Errors gard That did Job as an hypocrite despise, Judging his Job. 2. 9 misery his just reward. And Ge. 18. 12 Sarahs that with laughter did thy word regard. Means indirect permit me not to use, Good either to my self for to attain, As Ge. 29. 23 and 38. 14 Leah, Thamar did for Issues chuse, Or as Ge. 27. 13 Rebecca did; for others gain, Joshu. 2. 5 Rahab, and 2 Sa. 17. 19 she that in the Wel did Spies maintain Rachel's Gen. 30. 1 impatience at thy providence, And Num. 12. 1 Miriam's Envie (Lord) in me restrain, Phil. 4. 2 Evodias and Syntiches Difference, 1 Sa. 18. 6Their Babling that Sauls envious wrath did gain When in their Song they sang, David's ten thousand slain. With Ex. 4. 25 Zipporah, O let me not despise Religion's wholsome just severitie, Nor count (with 2 Sam. 26 20. Michoc) David's zeal unwise; Ge. 36. 22 Bilhah's Temptation free me from, and 2 Sa. 11. 3 She That left Uria's house, in Davids Court to be. Me by the sight of brasen Serpents heal, From stinging Nu. 21. 6 Serpents firy 'xamples keep, And from 1 Sa. 28. 7 her Witchcraft that rais'd Samuel From Jesabels 2 Ki. 9. 22 first and Apo. 2. 22 second, with whom sleep Full many Princes of the earth in darkness deep The Worldly hope put from me of Ge. 19. 16. Lots Wife, Of Jud. 5. 28 Sisera's mother, Ruth. 1. 14 Orpah's faign'd pretence, Gen. 4. 23 Lamech and Ge. 26. 35 Esau's Wives Contentious life, Gen. 27. 9 Hagars, 1 Sam. 1. 6 Peninnah's spirits virulence, And cursed Micha's Mothers cursing violence. Me from the Wandring Gen. 34. 1 Dina's humour shield, Lots Ge. 19. 32 et. 39. 32. daughters Lust, & Pharaohs Stewards Wife, Nu. 25. 1 15.Women of Moab, Cozbi by Phincehs kill'd; The Levites Iud. 19. 2 Leman that did cause such strife, And 2 Ki. 9. 22 Hers by Jehu punished with losse of life. Keep me from 1 Ki. 9. 22 Athalia's Cruelty, And 2 Ki. 11. 1 Hers that would have had the child divided; Mar. 6. 24 Herodias and her daughters melodie; From Est. 1. 12 Vashties stoutnesse, and theirs that provided To make their Iud. 14. 16 Husbands mighty Samsons strength derided. Lord free me from Acts. 5. 8 Sapphira's spiritual Lie, From 1 Ki. 11. 4 Solomons idolatrous glosing Wives. Loves; And from 1 Ki. 15. 3 Maacah's base Idolatrie, Depos'd by Asa for her Idol Groves; And those Ezek. 8. 14 Shee-Tammuz Priests Ezekiel reproves. The smallest grain of Vertue of the best Plant in my heart; And frame in me a minde Alwayes to make a conscience of the least Infirmitie which in the weak I finde, And from presumptuous sins let me be quite confind. PART. II. The Humble Mans Prayer. God, Second Person in the Trinitie, Whose being is Eternal Uncreate; Who in the daies of thy humilitie Didst here converse below in mean estate; Make me to shun these sins, and thee to imitate. Contents. Self-love, Gods nature worship, power affecting, His Justice and his Promises despising; Commandements, and just reproofs neglecting; His Prophets and his prophecies misprising; Inward and outward Pride of lifs enticing, Setting my heart on Envie, Pomp, Promotions, My heart in to deep knowledg exercising, Advancement, that may hinder my devotions, Dissimulation, all ambitious Commotions. O Lord the God of Love, which dost not love Self-love, whereby man doth himself misprise, Created in thine image from above; Humble me, left I seek to equalize Thy Natures Dignity, as Jude. 6. Angels did devise. Or like Dan. 3. 7 Nebuchadnezzar, for to gain The Worship that to thee is only due, As Hest. 3. 2 Haman and Dan. 6. 7 Darius, Act. 12. 13 Herods train; Or of thy mighty Power to make false shew, As 2 Tim. 3. 8 Jannes, Jambres, Esa. 14. 14 Belshazzer and Act. 8. 10 Magus crew. Inspire me, lest thy Justice I despise As King 2 Ki. 6. 33 Jehoram, 1 Ki. 13. 2 Jeroboam durst; 1 Gen. 4. 24 Lamech, 2 K. 19. 12 Sennacherib: Or thy Promise, As Ge. 25. 33 Esau, and young Gen. 21. 9 Ishmael accurst; Or 2 Kin. 7. 2 Prince which in Samarias gate with presse was burst. Lest thy Commandement I disobey, Like Gen. 11. 4 Nimrod, Gen. 38. 9 Onan, Exod. 5. 7 Pharoh, bloody Ge. 46. 8 Cain; Or due and just Reproofs do cast away, As 2 Sam. 3. 7 Abner when he had with Rispa lain, The Lu. 16. 14 Pharisees, and Iob. 12. 5 Judas that hath Christ betrain. Neither thy Prophets slightly entertain, As men of th'old Ma. 24. 38 World drowned in the flood; Gen. 9. 22 Cham, 1 Ki. 22. 26 Ahab, Matth. 27. 46Pharises, two 2 Kin. 1. 9 Captains slain, With the devoured Bethels 2 Ki. 2. 23 mocking brood, King Anno. 7. 10 Amaziah, Lu. 23. 11 Herod in his scoffing mood. Turn me from Iob. 7. 49 Pharisees inward Pride of life, Delighting in the ignorant peoples shame; Or outward, as Iud. 1. 7 Adonibezek's knife, 1 Sa. 13. 22Philistims, that made Israels weapons lame; Ki. 20. 25 Benhadad, 1 Sa. 11. 2 Nabash, 2 Sa. 10. 4 Hanu, 2 Ki. 8. 12 et. 15. 16 Azael, Menahame. From Nu. 16. 1 Corah's Envying others for Promotion; With Iud. 12. 4 &. 9. 5. Ephramites, Abimelech, 2 Sa. 20. 10 Joab, 1 Sa. 18. 9 Saul, Setting on Pompous vanity my devotion, As men of Eze. 6. 49 Sodom, 2 Sam. 14. 25 Absolom, and all The vain superfluous pride in Hest. 1. 3 Ahashueros Hall From motions all of Pride do thou me save, Ev'n such as thy deer children set on fire; As Gen. 3. 6 Adam Knowledg only sought to have, And 2 Co. 12. 7 Paul, who did enjoy his own desire; Or Nu. 11. 29 Joshua, who for envie did thereof enquire. Let no Advancement (Lord) my heart lift up As 2 Sa. 24. 1 Davids, when he would the people number; Or 2 Chr. 32 25. Ezekiah when God fill'd his cup; As Mat. 20. 21 James and John, stiled the Sons of Thunder, Whose mother did desire to keep th'Apostles under. At which the Matth. 20. 24 Ten were mov'd with Indignation, As sons of Jacob, that their brother sold, Were mov'd Act. 7. 9 with envie at his divination: And Nu. 12. 1 Aaron that with Moses sought to scold. Me as I am, not worse nor better let men hold. FINIS
